rules_text: {R}{R}: Marketplace Offerings deals 1 damage to you. Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn.
notes:
2k17
CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you. > Marketplace Offerings deals 1 damage to you. Exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until end of turn.
